name: squeezelite_mc
description: A plugin that installs and runs Squeezelite with (M)onitoring and (C)ontrol. Aims to work with minimal configuration, displays playback status on Volumio and provides basic player controls.
author: Patrick Kan

volumio_info.details: A plugin that installs and runs Squeezelite with (M)onitoring and (C)ontrol. Aims to work with minimal configuration, displays playback status on Volumio and provides basic player controls.
